trustfund: TF025822-PHRD-BRAZIL: BAHIA HEALTH PROJECT,TF037447-BRAZIL - BAHIA HEALTH

abstracts.cdata!:
The Bahia State Health Reform Project
            will assist Bahia to improve the health status of its
            population.  Although the project does not have a direct
            impact on the environment, the implementation of health
            services and the generation of medical wastes as these
            health centers provide better services, might have a direct
            connotation with environmental implications.  The final
            disposition of medical and solid waste may impact
            surrounding natural resources and could generate negative
            effects.  Negative effects of the Project are related to
            construction; operation and maintenance of health centers,
            particularly in municipalities with limited resource to
            implement proper management; and final disposal of medical
            wastes.  The major mitigation measures proposed include
            implementation of existing environmental assessment and
            licensing of health centers; mandatory preparation of
            medical waste plans; technical assistance for solid waste
            management plans; incentives for proper solid waste
            management plans; implementation of environmental criteria
            in the audit of health services, construction, and
            supervision of infrastructure; and implementation of basic
            sanitation information.
